name: Floating Form Labels
description:
Tired of creating form fields with floating labels (like in Material Design, Bootstrap etc.) in Figma that never seem to scale nicely?


Get started quickly with this beautifully-spaced and crafted set of components made up of:

  • Text Field (the base, comes in 5 different states)
  • Dropdown Field (2 states)
  • Password Field (2 states)


Comments on how this can be improved are welcomed.
